entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: Classic Maze Game for Watch
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: Official DVSA Theory Test Kit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • DVSA Driving essential skillsÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]

Application Description

The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) are the people who set the tests and this app is by their official publisher, The Stationery Office (TSO). It‚Äôs regularly updated and covers everything you need to know to pass your theory test, drive safely and improve your road safety awareness! Our app is for CAR DRIVERS in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. This app can be used offline so that you can practise anytime and anywhere. KEY HIGHLIGHTS ‚Ä¢ Over 770+ practice theory questions. ‚Ä¢ Custom mock tests. ‚Ä¢ 36 interactive CGI hazard perception clips. ‚Ä¢ Free access to The Highway Code. ‚Ä¢ Exclusive access to one of the 3 source materials for the theory test: ‚ÄòThe Official DVSA Guide to Driving ‚Äì the essential skills‚Äô (additional purchase required). ‚Ä¢ Progress tracking. ‚Ä¢ Advanced search tool. ‚Ä¢ Voiceover features. TEST YOURSELF ‚Ä¢ Take unlimited quick and timed mock tests. Build a custom practice set or take a timed mock test with 50 questions ‚Äì just like the real thing. ‚Ä¢ Your progress will also be monitored and visualised in graphs, so you can see how far you‚Äôve come and when you are ready to pass. STUDY AND PRACTISE ‚Ä¢ Read the exclusive study content to increase your knowledge of all theory test topics and test your understanding by answering practice questions (including all official questions, over 770+!). ‚Ä¢ You can also select specific question sets from areas you may be struggling with. Got a question wrong? See the correct answer, note the explanation and find out more with references to The Highway Code and other official DVSA guides! VIDEO CASE STUDIES ‚Ä¢ 9 bonus case studies so that you can practise multiple choice questions about a short video clip. PROGRESS GAUGE ‚Ä¢ Backed by learning science, use the progress gauge to measure your test readiness, providing you with confidence that you‚Äôre ready to pass your theory test. THE HIGHWAY CODE ‚Ä¢ To support your study, we‚Äôve included a free copy of The Official Highway Code to revise from. EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ‚Ä¢ This is the only app to offer ‚ÄòThe Official DVSA Guide to Driving ‚Äì the essential skills‚Äô, one of the 3 key source materials that the multiple choice questions in the theory test are based on. Study these to learn the rules and skills you‚Äôll be tested on (additional purchase required). SEARCH FEATURE ‚Ä¢ Do you want to learn about airbags, stopping distances, or yellow lines, or practise questions on road markings? Use our advanced search tool to find the content you need. ENGLISH VOICEOVER ‚Ä¢ If you have reading difficulties (such as dyslexia), or prefer to learn by listening, use our voiceover feature within the test section to support you. USEFUL LINKS AND SUPPLIER ZONE ‚Ä¢ Navigate through useful resources to support your learning, including the Safe Driving for Life website ‚Äì a one-stop information resource featuring helpful blogs with lots of tips to help you pass. ‚Ä¢ Passed your test? Use our supplier zone to help you with the next steps in your driving journey. ‚Ä¢ Ready to Pass? links to DVSA‚Äôs official resources to help you understand what it takes to be ready for your driving test. Give yourself the best possible chance of passing by learning vital skills, managing your nerves and taking mock tests. FEEDBACK ‚Ä¢ Let us know what you‚Äôd like to see. We‚Äôd love to hear from you with any comments or suggestions about this app. AWARDS AND RECOGNITION ‚Ä¢ Produced by the official publishers of DVSA (TSO). ‚Ä¢ Over 4+ million downloads. ‚Ä¢ Featured on Apple‚Äôs Top Education Apps. ‚Ä¢ Nominated for App of the Year (FirstCar). SUPPORT ‚Ä¢ Contact our UK-based team at feedback@williamslea.com or +44 (0)333 202 5070. We listen and respond to your feedback by updating the app and adding new features.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Everybody's RPG: Reboot
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Recruit legendary heroes and conquer endless stages! From auto battles to mining and upgrading! A true idle fantasy RPG that keeps growing even when you're away! * Build strategic teams with unique and powerful heroes! * Mine resources through the mining system! Get everything you need to craft gear! * Challenge powerful bosses and claim legendary rewards! * Progress automatically ‚Äî perfect for busy players! * Tons of content: dungeons, relics, evolution, legendary equipment, and more! Download now and begin writing your own legend! Start playing now and collect your heroes!

entry.title: Root Board Game
entry.summary:
Price: $9.99 ‚Üí $4.99
The Riverfolk Expansion: $9.99 ‚Üí $6.99
Root: The Underworld Expansion: $9.99 ‚Üí $7.99
Exiles & Partisans & Vagabonds: $7.99 ‚Üí $5.99
The Clockwork Expansion: $5.99 ‚Üí $3.99
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • The Riverfolk ExpansionÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $9.99]
  • Root: The Underworld ExpansionÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $7.99 [$7.99 ~ $9.99]
  • Exiles & Partisans & VagabondsÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $5.99 [$5.99 ~ $7.99]
  • The Clockwork ExpansionÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $5.99]

Application Description

Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness. The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance‚Äôs hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods. Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DungeonSquad
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. ‚óá 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills ‚óá The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild ‚óá Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

entry.title: Auto Redial App
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.49 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.49]Ôºâ

Application Description

With this application, you can make automatic calls to the numbers you want efficiently and personalized. You can define the number of repetitions, the interval between calls, add an extension, activate vibration before dialing, and schedule your calls in a calendar. Additionally, you'll enjoy an easy-to-use interface, a detailed call history, and multiple customization options. This application is ideal for anyone who needs to make repetitive calls automatically.

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö$34.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $34.99]

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

entry.title: Day R Premium: last world war
entry.id: Day R Premium: last world war-us-1747940529582
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

entry.title: Iron Marines: RTS offline game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real time strategy sci fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids and robot armies in a galaxy far far away. PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities. TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons. Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command. The galaxy needs the Iron Marines FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy! ‚Ä¢ 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space. ‚Ä¢ 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more. ‚Ä¢ +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What‚Äôs better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles! ‚Ä¢ DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well‚Ä¶ some are machines and these aliens aren‚Äôt green‚Ä¶ but they‚Äôre all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines! ‚Ä¢ 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you‚Äôre the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy! ‚Ä¢ NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed! ‚Ä¢ CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don‚Äôt get cocky! Or Do! Your choice! ‚Ä¢ IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

entry.title: Âè¨ÂñöÈ®éÂ£´Âúò
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.29 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.29]Ôºâ

Application Description

„ÄêGame Introduction„Äë 'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content. „ÄêIn-App Purchases Unlock„Äë Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate. 'Song of the Knight': The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey. 'Shining Stars': The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines. „ÄêDevice Support„Äë ¬∑ iOS 10.0 and above ¬∑ Operating memory of 3GB and above ¬∑ iPhone 7 and above ¬∑ iPad Air 3 and above „ÄêContact Us„Äë If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email. Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: This Is the Police
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you‚Äôll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg‚Äôs crime bosses. Sometimes you‚Äôll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg? - Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That‚Äôs up to you! - Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game ‚Äì and the fate of Jack Boyd. - The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them. - Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more. - Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg. - Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price. Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Aces of the Luftwaffe Squadron
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

The Squadron has reached your mobile device! Dodge a bullet storm and face fearsome aerial war machines! Lead your squadron to victory in two different campaigns, full of story twists and legendary boss fights! ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE - SQUADRON is an action-packed vertical scrolling shoot‚Äò em-up with a fascinating and fully voiced narrative. Dodge bullets, collect massive power-ups and wisely use special abilities to defeat your enemies. Two campaigns with 50 levels in total, waves of various deadly enemies and a lot of epic boss fights. Are you up to this task? When Europe seemed to be free, a secret German commando called The Aces of the Luftwaffe took their chance to strike back and invade the USA! It‚Äôs your duty to restore peace and liberty aboard deadly wings of steel in bombastic air battles! However, every story has two sides. While the Aces of Luftwaffe begin their assault on the United States, you are charged with leading a squad of elite German pilots on a secret mission. Embarc on an epic aerial adventure of intrigue and deceit from a secret base in the Bermuda Triangle. Choose your side, decide your role and take off! - Action-packed Shoot ‚Äôem up with explosive special effects - Heroic NPC wingmen that will follow your order - Skill trees with individual abilities for each wingman - Challenging achievement system - Captivating storyline with fully voiced characters - 50 levels and exciting missions¬† - 12 spectacular boss fights - Epic movie-like orchestral soundtrack

entry.title: 60 Parsecs!
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age. Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN? This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets. Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive? Bon voyage! SCAVENGE & EVACUATE With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy. SURVIVE & DECIDE Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you. EXPLORE & CRAFT Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure. LEAD & PROTECT As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content! NEW GAMEPLAY MODE Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test! NEW OPPORTUNITIES to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style? NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members! NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter! NEW ACHIEVEMENTS! With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind? Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland. Good luck.

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features ¬∑Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! ¬∑Hundreds of monsters to defeat! ¬∑Hundreds of equipment to collect! ¬∑Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! ¬∑Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page
